question:
[Jeremy] and his brother [Jeff] went to the park to play basketball. [Traci] went to the store with her sister [Sheila] [Traci] and her aunt, [Ruth], went to the bookstore. [Traci] bought some fantasy books, while [Ruth] picked up some mysteries. [Ruth] loves cooking for her son. His name is [Jeremy] [Cristina] went to the mall, because she wanted to look for a present for her daughter, [Sheila].
Question: How is [Jeff] related to [Cristina]?

- [Jeremy] and his brother [Jeff]

- [Jeff] is the brother of [Jeremy]

- [Ruth] is the aunt of [Traci]

- [Sheila] is the daughter of [Cristina]

- [Jeff] is the brother of [Jeremy], who is the son of [Ruth]
- [Ruth] is the aunt of [Traci], who is the sister of [Sheila]
- [Sheila] is the daughter of [Cristina]

Step 4: Make the final inference
- Based on the relationships identified, [Jeff] is the nephew of [Cristina] through his connection to [Ruth], who is [Cristina]'s sister.

By following these steps, you can analyze the relationships in the story to infer the connection between [Jeff] and [Cristina].
